Articles.Content:
I wanted to go to Minmus, but with a ridiculously large Apollo-esque rocket. Here's a playthrough of it:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download coming soon.

Mods used: Atomic Rockets, MechJeb, Procedural Fairings.

Also sorry for some missing images for the landing/taking off from Minmus, redocking with the command module, and the bit where I undocked the command module from the lander and circularized the pod's orbit.

The rocket also has a giant first stage which I did not show.

Edited November 22, 2014 by _Augustus_
Overengineering. It would be enough stock LV-N, connected to the middle tank.
